name: F!x me ! I'm famous
description:
Description

Two teams of robots race to gather their master computer parts and reassemble them. Each team try to reproduce the computer configuration pattern : the blue one is displayed on the top-left corner of the screen, the red one on the bottom-right corner.

The first team that reproduces its pattern wins. Your are free to put the parts anywhere on the map. the only condition is to have a matching-pattern somewhere on the map.

Any robot can pick a part. At this point the part takes its carrier color. When your try to take an opponent-coloured part, you will have to wait for a while in front of it, until its color changed back to yours. That means it is easier and faster to take a white part than an enemy-coloured one. But it is not safe to let your opponent finish its pattern before you. It is up to your team to decide which strategy you will use.

This game was performed during the Global Game Jam 2020 event in Cergy - FRANCE. Enjoy !

Play here !

If you want to test the game directly in your web browser, click here !

Controls

All controls are performed with a gamepad.

At start, press the A button to register your robot. When your robot is displayed on screen, press A again to change your team (either blue or red). Whatever the number of gamepads you have, anyone can join the game by pressing A.

When all players are ready, one can press START button and the race begins.

Move your robot using either the left analog axis, or the cross. Grab a computer component by keeping A button held. When you release  this button, the computer part is left on the floor.

When you try to take a computer part that is enemy-coloured, you have to wait with A button pressed for a while : the color will fade to white, and then will get your team color : the computer part is now yours and you can move it anywhere.
